reviews.review:
Portal 2 is an awesome game.  I enjoyed the first one immensely, but I think I love the sequel even more.  More puzzles with different dynamics added in and interesting characters really build on what the first game offers.  I love GLaDoS (she's as snarky as ever if even more), Wheatley and Cave Johnson.  It's a really good, solid game overall.  The only downside is that it doesn't really have much for replayability unless you do some of the co-op stuff.  And even then, once you've gotten through the co-op with a friend, there's not much more past that.  But overall, I highly recommend Portal 2, it's one of the best games out there, I think.  

(I know, it shows that I've only played the game for seven minutes on Steam but I've completed the game and more on the XBox 360 version.)

This is by far my favorite puzzle game.  I love the conjunction of great puzzles and great story telling.  The story is quite interesting if you pay attention to the details.  I felt like this game had a good balance of difficulty on the puzzles ranging from intuitive to pretty difficult.  Overall I would recommend this game.

The good: New, clever mechanics in addition to the clever mechanics of the first game; excellently written dialogue, spoked by very talented voice actors; and an interesting story that takes you deeper into the history of Aperture Science than you realized you wanted to go.

The bad: It isn't as tight as the first game. Portal 1 left you wanting more; Portal 2 leaves me feeling it could have been a little shorter. The puzzles also aren't quite as well-designed as the first. Much of the time, you're forced to figure out for yourself which walls you can shoot portals onto by trial and error, as opposed to the first game, in which you just knew because of the simplistic visual aesthetic.

if this game was a cake it would be a good cake

wait a second...

...the cake is a lie   <:(

Это замечательная игра, каждая комната разная, каждый новый уровень добавляется что-то новое, вам не будет скучно. А в конце вы прочуствуете, то что чуствует героиня. Не в каждой игре есть красивый, лаконичный сюжет и интересный, разнообразный геймплэй. И если вы по каким-то причином еще не купили игру, покупайте она стоит своих денег.  Я не говорю, что эта игра шедевр, но если вам нравятся головоломки, харизмотичные персонажи и сарказм(в даном случае его более чем достаточно), то эта игра для вас. Ах, да, тут еще есть кооператив, так что если вы прошли сюжет, можете еще повеселится с друзьями.

Ho appena terminato il gioco, è stato davvero molto bello. Non scendo nei particolari perchè non ho ancora giocato il 1° capitolo, però la trama di questo mi ha entusiasmato assai. la storia si presenta molto fluida e ben organizzata, la giocabilità e i requisiti minimi di sistema sono ottimi, (si può giocare benissimo anche su portatile con prestazioni non tanto elevate) e poi c'è la modalità multigiocatore, dove i 2 players impersonano i due robot test "Atlas" e "Peabody". anche il multiplayer è molto bello, perchè si divide in svariate camere di test e i giocatori possono scegliere la camera che desiderano completare, insomma una modalità completamente libera!!
Ottimo gioco complimenti.
Half-Life 3 is finally here! more portals and robots! oh and cake.

Spaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaace. I play this game through at least once a year, the puzzles are fun, the story is great, and the characters are amazing. Cave Johnson is the real MVP of this game.

Portal 2:

[h1]Positives:[/h1]

+ The story is a big improvement from the original Portal, which was vague and bareboned. There's more dialogue this time around which actually explains what's going on, along with the usual amusing banter.

+ The puzzles in Portal 2 are leaps and bounds ahead of the first Portal. They are more intricate, less predictable and require the use of multiple strategies in order to progress. They're also greater in number than the meagre 19 offered in Portal. Furthermore, Valve has created some new, interesting gameplay mechanics. The introduction of repulsion gel (which allows you to jump very high), propulsion gel (which gives you the ability to run extremely fast) and conversion gel (which alters any physical surface it touches to become portable), results in a varied, distinct gameplay experience.

+ The graphics are a step up from Portal, which is nice.
+ Co-op mode for those who enjoy playing with friends.

[h1]Negatives:[/h1]

- Only 10-15 hours worth of content (singleplayer), which is quite short, especially when similar puzzle games like the Talos Principle have a solid 30 hours +

- Some elements of the puzzles in Portal 2 were made to be intentionally deceiving, at least in my view. The main culprits were parts of the environment (grates, pipes) obstructing my view of surfaces where I could fire portals. I could logically deduce a puzzle with ease, had I know such surfaces existed. Instead, I was left scratching my head for an hour, attempting to get through an unsolvable puzzle. Not my idea of fun.

- The story of Portal 2 is fine, but in contrast to other first person puzzle games like the Talos Principle, it becomes clear that it cannot measure up, to any degree. The Talos Principle combined a deep, meaningful and intriguing plot with important decision making, something Portal 2 doesn't do.

Overall Score: 7.5/10

Portal 2 is a pretty decent game and there's nothing intrinstically wrong with the puzzles or storyline, other than its longevity and perhaps its linearity. Only when you analyse it in comparison to other puzzle games like the Talos Principle, can you identify its weaknesses. Portal 2 can never meet the level of quality the Talos Principle delivers in its puzzles and its story (comparatively speaking) is lame.

Nevertheless, I do recommend Portal 2 for anyone who hasn't yet played it. A 95/100 Metacritic score is unwarranted, but it's still a cool adventure.

Purchasing on sale is a must.

Valve se dvema seriemi zapsalo nesmazatelne do herni historie. Half-Lifem a Portalem. Obe maji neskutecne osobity cool feeling a i kdyz Source engine neni z nejnovejsich, Portal 2 vypada fantasticky. Miluju tu stylovost, ty scenerie a vize, ktere predvadi. Kilometry pod zemi, presto obri prostory plne sci-fi techniky. Uzasne solo hrani vyuzivajici zvlastniho pocitu samoty a malosti. To vse diky relat. nenarocnosti enginu plynule na max detaily ve fullhd.
Pokud jste hrali jednicku, prvni pulka dvojky vam prijde docela snadna. Nejdriv se po probuzeni z kryogenniho spanku ocitate opet v ubikaci v Aperture, do ktere vas na konci prvniho dilu vratili. Projdete nostalgicky par znamych mistnosti, ovsem tentokrat je vse v rozkladu, rozbite nebo porostle vegetaci. Brzy pribude par novych mechanismu, jako zrcadlova (odrazna) kostka, svetelne mosty a katapulty. To vse se da jeste lehce zvladnout. 
Jak se vsak dostanete hloubeji do nitra komplexu a zacnete objevovat od zacatku historii Aperture Labs, pribudou do hernich mechanismu "balisticke" gely. Repulsion umoznujici odraz, Propulsion zvetsujici rychlost a Conversion schopny na neaktivnich plochach vytvorit portaly. Obcas se jeste objevi Cleansing gel, ktery je bud prekazkou nebo pomocnikem pri reseni. Obecne jsou gely neskutecne chytry fyzikalni napad, ktery umoznuje hru v obrich podzemnich komplexech, kde budete preskakovat zdanlive neprekonatelne prurvy ci splhat na mista, kde portaly normalne byt nemuzou. Ac se to zda zprvu slozite, reseni se da nalezt vzdy pomerne elegantne, nezacne vas stvat a plynule postupujete pribehem. 
Cela hra je docela obsahla. Proti temer experimentalni hricce Portal je druhy dil rekl bych tak 3-4x vetsi. Jak poctem hadanek, tak pribehem a prostory, ktere navstivite. Klasicke testovaci mistnosti se stridaji s lavkami, ochozy a "vnejsim" prostredim, kdy vlastne vidite testovaci chambers zvenku. V posledni 1/4 hry pak pribudou svetelne dopravni tunely, ktere vas (nebo gel) dopravi na potrebna mista.
Temer nemam, co bych vytknul. Snad jen loadingy, ktere jsou velmi caste a trochu kazi tempo. Rozporuplna je taky ukecanost hry. Opet je tu ten sarkasticky humor, uzasny voice-acting hlavne noveho Wheatleyho. To je fajn, ale hra je misty tak upovidana, ze nevite, zda cist titulky nebo se koukat kolem. Tahle hra by byla dokonala s kvalitnim CZ dabingem. Na jednu stranu by sice byla skoda perfektniho angl. akcentu Wheatleyho, ale zas by vam to umoznilo vic si uzit samotnou hru. Druhym resenim je zahrat si to znova samozrejme, bez cteni kazdeho titulku. Jinak preklad je velmi slusny a pri zapnutem CZ Steamu nedela problemy, narozdil od prvniho dilu, kde bylo nutno mit Steam anglicky a cestinu preinstalovat zvlast z Cestiny.cz.
Tentokrat ma hra navic take Steam karty. Achievementu je mnohem vic a rekl bych, ze bude dost tezke je splnit. Hodne z nich je z coop hrani, na ktere je idealni kamarad, abyste se mohli dorozumivat hlasem, jako napr. v CSku. V bonusech pak jsou ruzna videa, hafo komunitnich map...zkratka komu pribeh nestacil (mne tedy jo, mam radsi Portal jako solovku), tak si v coopu uzije dalsi desitky hodin.

When I finished the first game, I knew it would get a rightful place in my heart as one of my favorite games of all time. Portal brought a good story (ruled by a rather charismatic villain) and innovative mechanics -- and those are two elements that we see in many games, but there is hardly harmony between these two as there is in Portal series.

Portal 2 surprised me not only about visual improvement, but by expanding a story that I thought was complete and well done. This universe showed me that I did not know everything already, I still had much to learn and if you played Half-Life (especially the second one), you will plunge in this universe and will be very pleased by the divine surprises.

"Portal 2 being better than the first one" does not mean that the former game is bad or inferior in some way. It means exactly what I said: Portal 2 is better, and only that. I strongly advise you to play the first game and then the sequel, 'cause there are moments of history that will have much more meaning in that way.

In short, Portal is a piece of a cake, a cake stuffed with pleasant surprises. And we all love cakes, right?

Ну что тут говорить BlIZZARD INTERTAIMENT хорошо  постарались и сделалали хорошую игру с интересным сюжетом.Бесит правда когда видно тока тебя и всё,также остаётся загадка появлние Дробика в 8 уровне.Очень ещё интересно почему порталы чёрные белые могли б сделать синий и красный а то они иногда сливаются с фоном трясёт аж от этого.Кстати очень радует что свой вклад в эту игру ещё внесли и Ubisoft здесь совсем тонко но однако прослеживается\ тема ассасинов.к примеру вы видели как она роботов убивает во во блин я таких людей головорезами называю .Очень для меня был н понятен голос за кадром его почему то называют бладос или как там.Ещё бесят эти мосты они типа такие жёсткие в переломный момент на запад свалили и теперь когда всё хорошо вернулись не люблю таких.Ещё видели этих двоих роботов это что за дискриминация человеческого пола,что за метания то туда то сюда.Так же не понятно как из картошки голос был ясо стула упал от страха.Ну вообщем что можно сказать блины из вкуснолюбовы и салатики вкусные близзарды тоже молодцы ладно покупайте продукт в принципе качественный.

Portal 2

Sigue la historia en Aperture Science a mano de la misma protagonista de Portal. Este juego te llevara horas en su modo Historia ya que la historia es muy buena y a veces, comica con sus personajes que encontraras a lo largo de aperture science. El multijugador y el Workshop de Steam es la mejor combinación, encontraras varios niveles creados por la comunidad steam

O que é possível fazer com 2 portais? Posicione um defronte ao outro e enxergará a resposta; simplesmente infinitas possibilidades!
Para quem jogou a primeira franquia e está pensando em continuá-la: Não pense duas vezes, vá em frente!

Portal 2 acomodou um volumoso conteúdo a mais em relação ao que lhe antecedeu. 
Agora, por exemplo, os jogadores podem expor sua criatividade, produzindo suas próprias câmaras de testes, apresentando novas estratégias e artifícios a todo tempo. Desse modo, as câmaras são praticamente ilimitadas!

Infelizmente, o jogo só tem um problema, ou melhor dizendo, seria o que não tem: Uma continuação.

Sem dúvidas, um dos melhores que já desfrutei.

[h1] Portal 2...	[/h1] 
I Litterally cannot describe how [b] unbelivably astonishing [/b] this game possibly is. It cannot be done in any circumstances whatsoever. This game brings all games to the extent where as anyone could of thought to create a story and adventure...

I cannot pronounce how much i enjoy this game nor am i obsessed with its phenominal storyline, and history.
It completes me. and i complete it. 15 times. in 1-2 hours.

Valve could not of done a better job creating this miricle. It teaches you about who you really are as a person, it trains your brain in the most complex situations imaginable. it incorperates  fun and difficult, simotaniusly.

Buy this game. buy 47 of this game. buy one for your friends. buy it for your parents. buy it for your dog. but most importantly, buy it for yourself. and your dog.

Thank you for this bloody good time valve.

This game is probably my all time favorite of any game ever. Not only is the game play fun, but the story and dialouge are both interesting and entertaining. There were many times I laughed out loud and wanted to pull my hair out a little at the same time. There is not not just the story mode to consider though, you also have the co-op missions which are really fun in themselves. You can also build your own tests, share them, and play other players tests. 
Main game aside, there are also free mods to this game that are alternative stories and even more puzzles and entertaining plot. I see a lot of games out there that are $50 dollars and I play them and I just hate the entire experince... But for $20 I have owned this game for about 3 years and have always opened it and never regreted spending a cent. I highly reccomend this game to anyone. It is almost impossible to not enjoy at least some aspect of Portal 2.
Did anyone other than me play this over 100 hr... No..?

Portal 2 is really boring when you don't have a friend to play with. Randoms are (for 99.99% of them) impolite, annoying (when they put sv_cheats 1 for no reason) or just never played the game in solo before and join a random coop... Plus the fact you can't do coop challenge alone, even though 3/4 of the rooms can be done solo.
There's also a lack of good cooperative chambers in the workshop, most of them can be cheesed easily.

But when you got a friend to play with, you can do whatever you want, it's just great. And just because there's annoying random people that makes me think the game is boring won't prevent me to like this game. I have even found way to have fun with these annoying people.
